name: Come out of the Dark
description:
Title - Come out of the Dark 

Platform - Download to play 

Genre - Text Adventure Game 

Rating - E

Target Market - 8+, Casual Gamers 

Game Overview -

You have woken up in a dark mysterious room. You must make decisions on how to escape this darkness and survive. If you make the right choices, you will make it out but if you don't well let's just say it won't end well. The choice is yours !

Instructions - Download the file and enjoy.

Game Design Team - 

Game Designer: Zayid Bethune
